Question.Subject: My Explorer browser is all of a sudden opening all new pages in new windows?
Question.Content: It just started doing that little while ago today. How can I reset it to open pages in the same window? Can't find anything in Tools/Internet options. Not all new pages...it doesn't do it within Answers, for example. But most others...like clicking on a search result or something like that.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Tools. . . Internet Options. . . General Tab . . . .Settings . . . ."open links from other programs in. . ."
options:
1 A new window 2 A new tab 3 The current Tab or window <--------------- I believe this is what you are looking for. :)

Answer.Content:
Tools. . . Internet Options. . . General Tab . . . .Settings . . . ."open links from other programs in. . ."
options:
1 A new window 2 A new tab 3 The current Tab or window <--------------- I believe this is what you are looking for. :)
